data.name: showCameraConfig
data.info: Click to show the camera config popup. Once you choose your default camera, you may unclick this.

data.name: camWidth
data.info: The native width of the camera. For some reason there's a bug that requires the 'normal' width and height of the camera. You can try fiddling with these values if the scale seems wrong.

data.name: camHeight
data.info: The native height of the camera.
